definition: name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people

sentences.english: There're many world-known historic in China I'd like to visit.
sentences.chinese: 中国有很多世界闻名的历史古迹，我想去看看。

sentences.english: The football team in frankfort is very famous in the world.
sentences.chinese: 法兰克福的足球队世界闻名。

sentences.english: Amsterdam has a world-famous red-light district .
sentences.chinese: 阿姆斯特丹有一个世界闻名的红灯区。

sentences.english: The Bluenose built in Lunenburg is world famous.
sentences.chinese: 在卢嫩堡兴建的布卢诺斯是世界闻名。

sentences.english: A world-famous violinist is playing at tonight's concert.
sentences.chinese: 一位世界闻名的小提琴家将在今晚的音乐会上演奏。

sentences.english: This major in my university is world famous.
sentences.chinese: 我校的这个专业世界闻名。

sentences.english: The Dazu Stone Carving is World-famous.
sentences.chinese: 大足石刻是世界闻名的。

sentences.english: Tivoli , founded in 1843, is a world-famous amusement park in downtown Copenhagen.
sentences.chinese: 建于1843年提沃利是世界闻名的娱乐公园。

sentences.english: Confucius a great thinker all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 其实，孔子是一位世界闻名的大思想家。

sentences.english: Chinese gardens are well known in the world and beautiful Chinese landscapes are too numerous to count.
sentences.chinese: 中国园林世界闻名，山水风景更是不可胜数。

sentences.english: You will see many exotic birds and of course the world famous alligators.
sentences.chinese: 你能见到很多有异国情调的鸟和世界闻名的鄂鱼。

sentences.english: Get to France, see world to be known for the Ai non- Er iron pagoda.
sentences.chinese: 到法国，看看世界闻名埃非尔铁塔。

sentences.english: He dreamed of being a world famous football player.
sentences.chinese: 他梦想成为一名世界闻名的足球运动员。

sentences.english: There are over 20 world-famous thermal spa complexes and parks.
sentences.chinese: 现有20多家世界闻名的温泉综合场馆和公园。

sentences.english: Do you know what Guanlan is famous for in the world?
sentences.chinese: 你知道不雅观澜有什么在世界闻名？

sentences.english: They are commemorative coins, one in honour of the world famous giant pandas.
sentences.chinese: 那是纪念币，一种是世界闻名的大熊猫命名的。

definition: to be famous far and wide (idiom)
seasoned/honed to perfection over centuries/special reserve
